name: Nectar
headline: Collecting companies' carbon emissions data
description: Nectar helps large companies collect carbon emissions data for mandatory disclosures. Over 50,000 companies today are required to collect utility data for upcoming regulations in the US/EU. Sustainability teams manually parse the data, a process that takes 100M work hours annually, requires expensive audits, and results in inaccurate metrics. Nectar automatically extracts, structures, and inputs this data into companies' existing systems.

founders.name: Allen Wang, Founder
founders.description: Allen studied CS & EE and Math at MIT. Before founding Nectar with Katherine, he worked at Scale AI and Google. Talk to Allen about climate, math, or card magic.

founders.name: Katherine He, Founder
founders.description: Katherine studied computer science and business management at MIT. Previously she's worked at Two Sigma building financial pipelines that move millions of dollars daily. She holds a US record in poetry memorization.

# Manage all your utility data in one place.
Collect your global utility data automatically for carbon accounting and ESG reporting.
[Try it with my utility bill](https://nectarclimate.com/<./#demo>)
[Try it with my utility bill](https://nectarclimate.com/<https:/dash.nectarclimate.com/public-demo-embed>)
[Get started](https://nectarclimate.com/<./demo>)
[Try it with my utility bill](https://nectarclimate.com/<https:/dash.nectarclimate.com/public-demo-embed>)
[Try it with my utility bill](https://nectarclimate.com/<https:/dash.nectarclimate.com/public-demo-embed>)
Join these companies using Nectar to manage energy, water, and waste data. 
  * ![idaho milk](https://framerusercontent.com/images/5Up3US7IOuWFQkkDJTK1ZcE5MY.svg)
  * ![unravel carbon](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jpwJ2WgnXuQPtdYT9KINobGZXk4.png)
  * ![swire](https://framerusercontent.com/images/bbNVJZcSaDRLk667fq3BxGhf4U.png)
  * ![thomas foods international](https://framerusercontent.com/images/bm2yNu2ouQ10EYAISI7dtUA4.svg)
  * ![vontier](https://framerusercontent.com/images/7bq68kjjym1kRcfSdV3Y3CT70.svg)

  * ![green project tech](https://framerusercontent.com/images/fAEMQvaW5wgUlyoGxpWNHtbbUK4.png)
  * ![nettzero australia](https://framerusercontent.com/images/lZfkXaAFzJXoHz7kGRsbxVE.png)


## How Nectar works
## How Nectar works
Nectar reads your data from any utility account globally. Then, Nectar analyzes your utility usage. Finally, Nectar exports data to your existing ESG and carbon accounting platform.
Nectar reads your data from any utility account globally. Then, Nectar analyzes your utility usage. Finally, Nectar exports data to your existing ESG and carbon accounting platform.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PoH94aPLYVVuo1hdnjzWmL6skP8.png)
Link utility account
Inspect usage data
Analyze consumption
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/vC0quu73LJPH3QLb2fZ2IvHs2M.png)
Link utility account

Link utility account
Inspect usage data
Analyze consumption
## Utility bill live demonstration
Try Nectar's proprietary AI with your utility bill. Nectar will not share your data with any third-party services except data processors. 
## Built for enterprise utility data management
Built for sustainability and energy management teams at large enterprises
Built for sustainability and energy management teams at large enterprises
![huge coverage](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BXgm050sVgGrSdFACCUVmvYBSg.png)
![huge coverage](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BXgm050sVgGrSdFACCUVmvYBSg.png)
### Global utility coverage
Connect to 7000+ providers. Language-agnostic.
![audit history](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pMmjEWusBbHTNnWB6bitUqI0Crs.png)
![audit history](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pMmjEWusBbHTNnWB6bitUqI0Crs.png)
### Auditable data trail
Inspect usage data. Includes fully-auditable edit history. 
![custom exports](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xmLU50qEMnX5PvxZLG8ihcZPsA.png)
![custom exports](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xmLU50qEMnX5PvxZLG8ihcZPsA.png)
### Works with ESG platforms
Integrates with sustainability and ESG platforms.
![data completeness](https://framerusercontent.com/images/lFLOLQCFXfJdwJfUsAzz6pvbL4.png)
![data completeness](https://framerusercontent.com/images/lFLOLQCFXfJdwJfUsAzz6pvbL4.png)
### Data completeness
Easily identify missing data and fill gaps with one click.
![comprehensive analytics](https://framerusercontent.com/images/H6TdtC7SFHpHvjkoufRg9CUbv8.png)
![comprehensive analytics](https://framerusercontent.com/images/H6TdtC7SFHpHvjkoufRg9CUbv8.png)
### Extensive analytics
Visualize your usage and cost data in one place.
![secure SSO okta](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZEqqkhY45l5vlPQQS3spuo5jWjQ.png)
### Secured by Okta
SOC II Compliant. Microsoft Entra ID SSO included.
## Loved by sustainability and ESG teams everywhere
Don't just take our word for it. Hear from our customers in every industry.
Don't just take our word for it. Hear from our customers in every industry.
![nate streed - vontier](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KLGugqd77H02GSQiMbiRv2IGTTo.jpeg?scale-down-to=512)
![nate streed - vontier](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KLGugqd77H02GSQiMbiRv2IGTTo.jpeg?scale-down-to=512)
### Nate Streed
Senior Director of ESG
Vontier Corporation
"Nectar has transformed how we manage sustainability data. It’s reduced human errors, missing data sources, delays from manual data entry, and confusion regarding unit conversions."
![jeremy pike - idaho milk products](https://framerusercontent.com/images/N7qEAcKQCZvJI6nEGbSlMvqyw.jpeg?scale-down-to=512)
![jeremy pike - idaho milk products](https://framerusercontent.com/images/N7qEAcKQCZvJI6nEGbSlMvqyw.jpeg?scale-down-to=512)
### Jeremy Pike
Sustainability Leader
Idaho Milk Products
"Thanks to Nectar’s innovative solution, we can accurately assess our environmental impact, becoming a pioneer in sustainability among our peers."
![matt greening - nettzero](https://framerusercontent.com/images/a65CZz0v3F6vBUY8q8hdvMnSqxk.jpeg?scale-down-to=512)
![matt greening - nettzero](https://framerusercontent.com/images/a65CZz0v3F6vBUY8q8hdvMnSqxk.jpeg?scale-down-to=512)
#### Matt Greening
Founder and Director
Nettzero
"Nectar serves as a reliable and cost-effective technology solution to extract, store, and analyse sustainability data leading to enhanced reporting capabilities and streamlined workflows."
![marc allen - unravel carbon](https://framerusercontent.com/images/90gGTywovI5KeNe9w8KbtLwRk.jpeg?scale-down-to=512)
![marc allen - unravel carbon](https://framerusercontent.com/images/90gGTywovI5KeNe9w8KbtLwRk.jpeg?scale-down-to=512)
### Marc Allen
Cofounder
Unravel Carbon
"They'll (Nectar and Unravel Carbon) will take you through data challenges out there today and […] turn mountains of data into molehills."
![nancy summe - vontier](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NQoagW2njlLbTdEwfhr9A3O5Zz8.jpeg?scale-down-to=512)
![nancy summe - vontier](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NQoagW2njlLbTdEwfhr9A3O5Zz8.jpeg?scale-down-to=512)
### Nancy Summe
Sustainability Manager
Vontier Corporation
"It’s becoming clear that automation is a game changer—providing more accurate data, greater auditability in metrics and reporting, and saving time across a global team."
![jonathan reinbold - tfi](https://framerusercontent.com/images/MPH86mYZ90dWAyb5fyIDsMUIFZA.jpeg?scale-down-to=512)
![jonathan reinbold - tfi](https://framerusercontent.com/images/MPH86mYZ90dWAyb5fyIDsMUIFZA.jpeg?scale-down-to=512)
### Jonathan R.
Sustainability Director
Thomas Foods Int., USA
"Using Nectar has significantly streamlined the process of gathering and analyzing our utility data. The platform just works!"
[-> Read more about our customers](https://nectarclimate.com/<./customers>)
## Explore use cases
Nectar empowers global teams across industries like manufacturing, food and beverage, real estate, telecom, and technology.
Nectar empowers global teams across industries like manufacturing, food and beverage, real estate, telecom, and technology.
![scope 1 and scope 2](https://framerusercontent.com/images/JJUD6BSSw5SNdraVzuHq2M06jTs.png?scale-down-to=1024)
![scope 1 and scope 2](https://framerusercontent.com/images/JJUD6BSSw5SNdraVzuHq2M06jTs.png?scale-down-to=1024)
### For sustainability and ESG teams
Automatically collect your organization's energy, water, and waste usage data for carbon accounting. Save time, reduce errors, and monitor your data from one place.
[Learn more](https://nectarclimate.com/<./utility-data-collection>)
[Learn more](https://nectarclimate.com/<./utility-data-collection>)
[Get started](https://nectarclimate.com/<./demo>)
[Get started](https://nectarclimate.com/<./demo>)
### For carbon accounting partners
Nectar enables your team with accurate and auditable data. Automatically connect to your clients' utility accounts via the Nectar API. Nectar handles 2FA connection issues and multi language support for bills.
[Explore API](https://nectarclimate.com/<https:/docs.nectarclimate.com>)
[Explore API](https://nectarclimate.com/<https:/docs.nectarclimate.com>)
[Get started](https://nectarclimate.com/<./demo>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Nectar**

**Mission:** Nectar aims to simplify the process of collecting carbon emissions data for large companies, helping them comply with mandatory disclosure regulations.

**Background:** Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator Batch S23, Nectar is based in San Francisco. The company was established in response to an overwhelming challenge facing over 50,000 companies in the U.S. and EU, who need to gather utility data for sustainability reporting. The traditional method of data collection is slow, error-prone, and labor-intensive, consuming roughly 100 million work hours annually and resulting in costly audits with questionable accuracy. Nectar solves this problem by automating data extraction, structuring, and integration into existing systems.

**Team:** Currently, Nectar operates with a lean team of two employees, with Gustaf Alstromer from Y Combinator serving as their Group Partner.

**Target Market:** Nectar primarily serves large enterprises in sectors such as manufacturing, food and beverage, real estate, telecommunications, and technology, offering them tools to automate their utility management for energy, water, and waste. 

**Core Features:**
- **Automated Data Collection:** Links to over 7,000 utility providers globally, allowing seamless access to energy, water, and waste usage data.
- **Integrations:** Works with sustainability and ESG platforms, enabling users to visualize and analyze their utility data in one place.
- **Audit Trail:** Provides a comprehensive edit history for data, enhancing accountability and transparency.
- **Enhanced Analytics:** Offers extensive reporting capabilities, helping organizations identify gaps in their data and assess their sustainability impact accurately.

**Customer Testimonials:** Users have praised Nectar for reducing human errors, expediting data entry, and providing reliable metrics. Notable clients include Vontier Corporation and Idaho Milk Products, praising how Nectar has transformed their sustainability data management.

**Conclusion:** Nectar is positioned to be a game-changer in the climate tech space by tackling a significant operational hurdle for large enterprises and enabling them to make informed decisions towards achieving sustainability goals. As regulations tighten, Nectar's relevance and potential for growth will only continue to rise.

For more information, visit [Nectar](https://nectarclimate.com).
